response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, with an estimated worth of $1,200,000 to you. I am extending to you an offer to purchase this product at a special price, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please consider the following offer: $1,050,000 for the product. This price reflects my commitment to finding a solution that respects the value you place on this item while allowing us to reach a fair agreement.

Should you find this proposal acceptable, please let me know promptly so we can proceed with the necessary arrangements. If you require additional information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1050000}
